We all find a seat and wait for the next instructions, then the lights went off and something was placed on my head. The lights came back on and we weren't in the strange room anymore, yet we were in the Messhall. We all looked around the Mess and found that things were half eaten.

"Welcome all to the final test," His rough voice echoed, "This will test the skills you have obtained to get out of the Mess hall and to safety."

Then the other naga was next, then the dragon.

"where is Bayou?" I ask.
"Still in the kitchen." the dragon said.

131.title: Naga

1312.content:
Save the croc. You place the wiggling legs and tail together to prepare to take your meal. I make my way back to the door that leads out of the mess, and the fire was on my tail.
I through myself( with my cargo) through the doors and crashed onto my fellow recruits. we tumbled and rolled around in the darkness before we all stopped. then, slowly, the light began to urge me to open my eyes. When I did, we were back in the V room.

'Congratulations every one of you in passing the Trial by Fire test" Our beef of a Sargent said.

"What do you mean, Sir," the naga questioned.

"This was the final test to see where we should place you all" The bull boomed

"So what is my results," The dragon asked.

"Your results show that you are a liar and you abandoned a fellow officer," The bull said as he approached the dragon.

"WHAT??" the dragon proclaimed. " I AM ..."

"... going to take a trip through my four stomachs and think about what you have done. And if you manage to survive my fourth, I will enlist you in the force with no dent or mark on your rep." Before the dragon could argue more with our Sargent rammed his maw around the dragon's head, shoulders, and the tips of his wings and swallowed. He swallowed the dragon in under two minutes and we all saw a struggling bulge in the bull's gut.

"Spike, Bayou step forward," Sargent ordered. "Congrats, You both have been accepted into the VDF."

"Sarg, what do you mean?" Bayou asked.

"Well, the test is more of a personality test to see what is your character when you are left with a choice to either save a fellow trainee or not and Spike passed with flying colors." Sarg clarified

"So does that mean that Spike has been accepted and not me" Bayou questioned.

Sarg walked over to you and Bayou and placed his hands on Bayou and your shoulder then states "A cop needs to do whatever it takes to save anyone whether that is protecting them with their lives or eating them and you BOTH passed with flying colors as well as everyone else minus dragon face here." he finished his sentence with a pat on his stomach.
"Now the rest of you needs to pick a partner who will cover your back in tough situations," he concluded and with that, you look at Bayou and can tell that this will be a longlasting relationship.
1312.title: 'Rescue' the croc

13121.content:
It has been four long years, and You, Bayou. and the rest of your recruiting class have entered into different parts of the field, Your longtime friend, Fang who is also a naga, went into the forensic part of the team who look at piles of scat, a bag of slooge, or performing an autopsy on the expired victim to see is it was a willing death or was a murder.
The dragon has also managed to survive Sarg's stomachs though he lost his legs to the acid and now he is half the dragon he uses to be though he has cybernetics that replaces what was lost. The Doberman, who name is Jason Ress though everyone calls him ' Reeses' for how he tastes, works as a medic which means he does a full body exam to see if there is anything wrong with anyone.
As for me and Bayou, We are the first responders who either defuse the situation before it gets bad or evacuates any civilian who is in trouble. Also, Bayou confessed his love for me in front of the whole department and by Naga tradition, All naga's swallow there lovers. So I place Bayou's head in my maw and began to swallow him alive. After a few minutes, Bayou curls in my 'storage' stomach and gently squirms within. We also are the head investigators of the Vorer's attacks. 13121.title: 4 years later
